title: Test Login Successful
manualSteps: 1. Open a clean browser instance (Chrome/Firefox/Edge) in incognito/private mode.
2. Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/ and verify the page title equals 'Swag Labs'.
3. Locate the Username input field (placeholder='Username') and confirm it is empty and enabled.
4. Enter the exact text 'standard_user' into the Username field without extra spaces.
5. Locate the Password input field (placeholder='Password') and confirm it is masked and enabled.
6. Enter the exact text 'secret_sauce' into the Password field without extra spaces.
7. Locate the Login button and confirm it is visible and clickable.
8. Click the Login button and wait for the browser to start navigation.
9. Verify the URL changes to https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html.
10. Confirm the inventory page header 'Products' is displayed.
11. Log the test result as PASS if all assertions pass; otherwise FAIL with screenshots.
